name: Stormbroken
description:
Stormbroken - A Mecha Rescue Story was fully created in two weeks for MechaJam3

The year is 2038
Global warming is causing apocalyptic storms
Earth is suffering
You are our only hope
Save the refugees

WASD - Move

X - Activate Force Field
(After Shield Pickup)

Credits:
Grease - Producer, Lead Programmer
Lando's Lair - Artist, Designer, Programmer
Thimras - Sound Designer
